name: myMessageBoard
desc: A mini-message board web application that allows you to view and create new posts.

name: Thrift City
desc: A single-page application (SPA) for a mock online web-store. Features a homepage, store page, and shopping cart to hold and purchase items.

name: Memory-Card Game
desc: Webapp game that tests your memory. Only select cards that you have previously not clicked before. Assets were provided by the Nookipedia API.

name: CV-Application Maker
desc: A React application concept where users can input their information and generate a live preview of their CV/Résumé.

name: Homepage
desc: A homepage that displays my GitHub projects and overview about myself. The site is responsive and adjusts to various device screen sizes.

name: Battleship
desc: Webapp of the classic Battleship game. Play against a computer player and try to destroy all of their ships before they destroy yours.

name: JS Exercise: Testing Practice
desc: Testing exercises that comprise of creating a Caesar Cipher, Array Analyzer, and calculator modules. Babel was used to recognize ES6 import statements.

name: myWeather App
desc: Webapp that takes a given location and retrieves weather data from Visual Crossing API. The data is shown, as well as a related GIF from GIPHY

name: Tic-Tac-Toe
desc: A simple webapp that allows you to play a game of Tic-Tac-Toe against another (human) player.

name: JS Exercise: Knights Travails
desc: Graph data structure exercise which finds the shortest way for a Chess Knight piece to get from one square to another.

name: JS Exercise: Binary Search Tree
desc: JavaScript exercise that introduced data structures and algorithms. Created a module for BST related functions.

name: JS Exercise: Hash Maps
desc: JavaScript exercise that required creating a module containing hash map manipulation functions.

name: JS Exercise: Linked Lists
desc: JavaScript exercise that required creating a module containing linked list manipulation functions.

name: Admin Dashboard
desc: A webpage layout design for a general dashboard on the admin page.

name: myLibrary App
desc: My Library is a simple library webapp concept that displays user-inputted book entries and keeping track of which books are read.

name: Etch-Pad
desc: The magic Etch-Pad is a webapp that allows you to paint on a customizable board. Features include random colour mode, erase mode, and resizing the resolution of the canvas.

name: Simple Calculator
desc: As the project name implies, this is a basic webapp that contains a functional, no-frills calculator.

name: Sign-up Form
desc: A webpage layout design for a sign-up form. A small concept project that demonstrates form filling and different types of input field requirements.

name: Rock-Paper-Scissors
desc: Play Rock-Paper-Scissors against a computer player. Includes features such as changing the win condition and toggling cheats.

name: Landing Page
desc: A common webpage design of a landing page for a website. This project was my introduction to CSS and Flex design.

name: HTML Recipes Website
desc: My VERY first project and website. My introduction to HTML, CSS (as well as getting carried away with border-radius and background-color).
